channel.title: Post on Cloud Design Dev
channel.description: Recent content in Post on Cloud Design Dev

item.title: Testing
item.description: Overview Today I will be showing you how to get up and running with deploying a simple web application backed by a hosted IBM Cloud service. I will be utilizing the IBM Cloud CLI and will show a few different deployment options. Target audience This guide is really aimed at folks that have dabbled with command line and maybe even done a bit of light programming work but are unfamiliar with deploying applications to the IBM Cloud.
